text: The Vanishing may refer to: * The Golden Egg (also The Vanishing), a psychological thriller novella written by Dutch author Tim Krabb√© * The Vanishing (1988 movie), a 1988 thriller movie directed by George Sluizer * The Vanishing (1993 movie), a 1993 American psychological thriller movie * The Vanishing (2018 movie), a 2019 British psychological thriller drama movie directed by Kristoffer Nyholm
title: The Vanishing
